task: How to Pair Wine with Grilled Steak
step: Bring out herb flavors with a Bordeaux.
Match the savory flavors in beef with a Malbec.
Accentuate sweet and/or spicy flavors with a Zinfandel.
Pair with a dry riesling when you can't settle on a vintage.
Select your wine according to how well done the meat is.
